alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 3:13AM PDT until November 05 at 7:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Strongest winds will occur along higher ridges. * WHERE...In Oregon, East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. In Washington, Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
